column5: June 6 Twitter is preparing a $1 billion convertible note offering  the social media hub said on Wednesday  one day after news that it would be included in the S&P 500 Index sent its shares up 5 percent to the highest price in more than three years.

column4: Wal-Mart settles discrimination lawsuit by transgender worker
column5: June 6 Wal-Mart Stores Inc on Wednesday settled a lawsuit by a transgender former employee in North Carolina who accused the retail giant of unlawfully firing her for complaining about harassment.

column4: Key shareholder urges Canadian miner Nevsun to engage with suitors
column5: VANCOUVER Nevsun Resources  a Canadian miner which has been approached regarding a takeover  should enter "good-faith negotiations with any suitor " Adrian Day Asset Management  one of Nevsun's top 10 shareholders  said in an open letter to the company's board on Wednesday.
